com.ikueb.wallclock

Class AbstractFixedWallClock

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.time.Clock
      • com.ikueb.wallclock.AbstractFixedWallClock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FixedWallClock, WallClock, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FixedAlarmClock, FixedClock

    public abstract class AbstractFixedWallClock
extends java.time.Clock
implements FixedWallClock, java.io.Serializable
    A mutable WallClock abstract class that provides a fixed instant.
    Note: This is essentially a glorified ZonedDateTime wrapper class. There is an additional underlying Instant field, but that is really a cache of calling ChronoZonedDateTime.toInstant() whenever the date and/or time is updated. The time-zone is encoded within the ZonedDateTime instance, and is an immutable property.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
